content:
From: Christian Sternagel <c.sternagel@gmail.com>
(I was just checking all links in my ITP submission, again)

I usually use "Isabelle/HOL - A Proof Assistant for Higher-Order Logic"
as standard reference for Isabelle in my publications... until now the doi

http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/3-540-45949-9

worked. Currently it is not working but just points to

http://link.springer.com/

Also the "free preview" from

http://www.springer.com/computer/theoretical+computer+science/book/978-3-540-43376-7

Just points to http://link.springer.com/

No clue, whether this is just temporary... nevertheless, odd.

cheers

chris

From: Christian Sternagel <c.sternagel@gmail.com>
Also this doi

http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/978-3-540-24849-1_5

For Stefan's "A constructive proof of Higmanâ€™s lemma in Isabelle" does
currently not work... (as well as other, not Isabelle related, springer
dois that I have used in the past).

Sorry for complaining on the Isabelle list... but I had to share my
confusion and pain ;)

cheers

chris
